dpla.description: Time and Again spans time, finds mystery, delves into Science-Fiction, grounds itself in Einstein's theories and ultimately, settles into romance fantasy. So what's the problem? Author Susan Jane Gilman explains her guilty addiction to this cult pop thriller.
dpla.creator: Susan Jane Gilman
docs.dpla.title: Time and Again spans time, delves into Science Fiction, and ultimately becomes romance fantasy.

dpla.description: It was Albert Einstein's tendency to rebel that was the source of his great creativity, says Walter Isaacson in a new bestseller. Einstein's real genius was his ability to focus on mundane things that most people overlook.
dpla.creator: Linda Kulman
docs.dpla.title: A new biography argues that Einstein's tendency to rebel was the source of his creative genius.

dpla.creator: B'nai B'rith. Albert Einstein Lodge No. 5020

docs.dpla.title: Albert Einstein Lodge newsletter
